trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Grand Prairie
There were no other sightings in Grand Prairie on or around January 23rd 2013
Summary: 6-8 Spheres flying erratically at Grand Prairie/Dallas border. Daylight. 1-23-13 Appeared to be above D.N.A.S.
divs: sighting detailsin the backyard at 4pm lying in the grass enjoying a beautiful sunshiny day. i just opened my eyes and they were there. they appeared to be over the vacinity of d.n.a.s.\ henslee field. i immediately recognized them as sphere-type ufos. (i saw one once before in daylight in this same area in '87 or '88. that one was closer and the c-130s stopped their touch-n-goes until it passed.) i observed 6-8 spheres flying erratically. they just looped around individually with no apparent destination. kinda like a swarm of gnats. observed over a minute. they gathered and ascended toward a particular point and disappeared. then a straggler came from the south and rose to the same point and disappeared too. i don't know if they actually "disappeared" or just ascended out of sight very quickly. i suspect the latter. videotaped on iphone but they were too faint to appear on camera. i just felt surprised and excited.
